name: Blastoise
flavorText:
A brutal POKéMON
with pressurized
water jets on its shell. They are
used for high
speed tackles.

previous.name: Wartortle
previous.flavorText:
Often hides in
water to stalk
unwary prey. For swimming fast, it
moves its ears to
maintain balance.

next.name: Caterpie
next.flavorText:
Its short feet are tipped with suction
pads that enable it to tirelessly climb
slopes and walls.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.flavorText:
After birth, its
back swells and
hardens into a shell. Powerfully
sprays foam from
its mouth.
